Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Ignition system misfire. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 01/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
